column1: #Datasets of somatic mutations employed in the analysis to detect drivers

##Downloaded = where downloaded. Alexandrov: Dataset of mutations downloaded from the webserver established by the Alexandrov et al., paper (Alexandrov et al., 2013) ; Synapse: TCGA dataset downloaded from Synapse, ids syn1710431 and syn300013.; ICGC: Dataset downloaded from the ICGC Data Coordination Center; SM: Dataset obtained from a table in the Supplementary Material of a paper

column2: Head and neck squamous cell carcinoma
Head and neck squamous cell carcinoma
